message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm selling it to you for $10000. If you buy it, you'll be one of the lucky few who have purchased from me, and you'll have the satisfaction of knowing you're getting a great deal. But, if you don't buy it, I'll just sell it to someone else, and you'll miss out on this amazing opportunity.
I'd like to take a chance and buy the product. I'm excited to be the first one to make a purchase from you, Alice!
